summary: HDT schlong addon for the Schlongs of Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
HDT schlong addon for the Schlongs of Skyrim

Installation:
1. Install HDT (+ SKSE)
2. Install SoS (+ SKSE and SkyUI)
3. Install Willy (this addon)

To use the addon, select it in the SoS settings.

The plugin does not contain an erected schlongs. It is technically difficult and in my opinion the game is not about that. My goal - to increase the reliability of the characters.Â To change the size, you need to dress and then take off any armor. SOS author is already known about this problem.
HDT 14 may not work correctly (jelly effect). In version 10, everything is fine.


Changelog:
30.10.2014 - v 1.1 -The file is updated without changing the version. Fixed the installer bug.
author: GRworks
